content:
During the air intelligence, the fighters of the Kharkiv border detachment discovered the masked fighting machine of the enemy infantry.

About thisinformsState Border Service of Ukraine.

As it is noted, the enemy tried to carefully hide the BMP from the Ukrainian "eyes" in the sky. Was not destined. During night hunting, one accurate blow was destroyed - burned to the background.

"Border units in the Defense Forces of Ukraine destroy the enemy every day and bring our victory closer!" - emphasized in the department.

Recall SCO snipersshowedhow the occupiers are destroyed in the Avdiivsky direction.

As reported by the Armyinform, Commander -in -Chief of the Armed Forcesshowed the footage of destructiontechniques and weapons of Russians.
title: Our warriors with one blow crushed a hostile BMP
description: The State Border Service of Ukraine informs about it. As noted, the enemy tried ...
author: Army Inform
